p: The municipality of M’banza Kongo (6°16′00″ S 14°14′00″ E) and Tomboco (6°48′ 33.318″ S 13°17′56.904″ E), located in the province of Zaire, in the north of Angola. The municipality of Cazengo (9°18′ S 14°54″ E) of the province Cuanza Norte located in the north-central region of the country ( Figure 1).
